foundry-ink.title: Ink in the Foundry
foundry-ink.ready: Ink in the Foundry is ready.
foundry-ink.inkjs.name: inkjs

bindings-library.name: Bind Foundry External Functions
bindings-library.hint: Enabling this lets you use some premade helper functions in your ink script. Declare them using the EXTERNAL keyword.

hook-syntax.name: Use Hook Registration Syntax
hook-syntax.hint: Enabling this turns on hook syntax in the text of choices.

chat-render.name: ChatMessage Renderer
chat-render.hint: Enabling this renderer will output ink stories to the chat window.

console-render.name: Console Renderer
console-render.hint: Enabling this renderer will output ink stories to the F12 debug console.

dialogue-syntax.name: Dialogue Indication Syntax
dialogue-syntax.hint: If your ink script uses a common syntax to indicate speakers of dialogue, then you can use this drop down to select it.

warnings.no-choicetext:
"{name}" is the name of a hook, but there was no choicetext to display. This hook will be registered without displaying to the GM.
	Use "Hooks >> hookname -- choicetext" to display the choice.
warnings.tunnel-saves: Ink in the Foundry | The ink interpreter is inside a tunnel. Bugs will occur if you save the state here.

errors.not-found: The entity "{name}" was not found. Make sure this name was not a typo!
errors.not-inkjs-type: {key} returned a value inkjs cannot handle: {value}
